alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:41PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Harris County through 315 PM CDT... At 240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Magnolia Park, or over Galena Park, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Pasadena, South Houston, Humble, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Midtown Houston, Cloverleaf, Downtown Houston, Northside / Northline, Second Ward, Greater Heights, Neartown / Montrose, Greater Eastwood, Near Northside Houston, Greater Fifth Ward, Aldine, Greater Hobby Area, Greater Third Ward, Fourth Ward and University Place. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
